text: live your passion it can be nothing
better than taking your hobby or your
interest and turning it into a business
my brother and myself we grew up in the
business just surrounded by these you
know interesting color bottles and
spirits and I guess it caught our
imagination when your business is your
passion there's nothing more satisfying
than coming to work every day living
breathing what you enjoy the most your
staff can see you know the the passion
and the interest in you and how much you
care about the business I think I just I
think that filters through into them as
well being passionate about what you do
is fantastic but you still need an
element of business acumen and a
business sense you can't let your heart
take over your mind I mean a business at
the end of the day is there to to make
money to pay the bills to pay for the
staff it's key to get the balance right
[Music]
